Name: Galaxy Quest
Title: Galaxy Quest
Desc: Aliens kidnap actors from an old sci-fi TV series to fight a war.
LongDescription: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show -- now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.
